title: my league of legends isnt working :(
body: Well i havent  been on lol for a while so i went on then i open it  then nothing happens  i thought there would be an update but it just pops up with nothing it only saying league of legends riot game and i thought there would be pics for the new champ bard and whos on free week but just nothing just black :( btw im using a mini wifi broad band telstra stick so i cant download it again with olny $20 credit lol :(

replies.body:
RIP forums

You've been seeking help in the other discussions as well. I'll help sort them out over there, unless you'd like to start over here.
